parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. You can call the ListCluster operation to query the cluster ID. For more information, see [ListCluster](~~154995~~).

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. If you do not specify this parameter, the first page is returned.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of ECS instances to return on each page. If you do not specify this parameter, all ECS instances in the specified cluster are returned on one page.
